document_name: Regional Risk Reduction Intiative Project Document final.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/BRB/00051479/Regional Risk Reduction Intiative Project Document final.pdf

outputs.output_descr:
Output 1:  Capacity of OCTs in comprehensive disaster risk management in relation to hazard mapping and vulnerability assessments increased.  
Output 2:  Early warning system feasbility study and pilot implemented.
Output 3:  Capacity built in response, rescue and recovery.
Output 4:  Technical assistance provided for local institutions and implementing agents.

project_descr: OVERSEAS COUNTRIES AND TERRITORIES (OCTs) REGIONAL RISK REDUCTION INITIATIVE (R3I).
